name: Calendar Agent (with Google Calendar)
description: AI-powered chat agent that helps manage your Google Calendar through natural language conversations
useCase: Interact with your Google Calendar using natural language. Check availability, find events, and manage your schedule through a conversational AI agent.
requirements: Google Cloud Platform project with Calendar API enabled
Web browser to access chat interface
author: n8n Team
features: Check availability for specific time ranges
Search for events by date range
limitations: Chat interface must remain open during conversation
